title: Project Dawn
description: A decentralized AI node built on the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Reimagines the "Large Language Model" as a distributed, SETI-inspired mesh network.
summaryDescription: Project Dawn is a decentralized AI node built on the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It reimagines the "Large Language Model" not as a centralized corporate service, but as a distributed, SETI-inspired mesh. By utilizing a P2P-sharded architecture, it allows individual nodes to contribute idle compute cycles to a collective networkâ€”creating a powerful, resilient AI that lives on the edge, not in a data center.
